brand.name: ABS Immo Services
brand.description: An fañan klien yi ci jënd, jaay ak investismaŋ ganna ak yoonu premium ak siru.

positioning.title: Yoonu Liggeey
positioning.text: An moy xam ganna dëkk ak investismaŋ yu am doole, di jox ndimbal bu nafan.

hero.title: ABS Immobilier
hero.subtitle: Immobilier bu bees ak solo, ak kersa ak liggéey bu baax.

story.s1: Anu sos expérience immobilière bu am solo.
story.s2: Rafet du dara rekk. Moo di sunu signature.

global.title: Présence internationale
global.text: Dakar, Paris ak Dubaï, anu toppatoo client yi ak opportunité yu am solo.

hero.description: Anu dimbali ay nit ñi ci jënd kër ak suuf yu am solo ci Senegaal ak biti.

analysis.title: Saytu bu baax
analysis.text: Anu saytu marché bi ngir gis furs yu rafet.

security.title: Wóor
security.text: Jëf yu am yoon ngir am jàmm.

execution.title: Jeexital bu baax
execution.text: Anu toppatoo sa projet ba mu jeex.

cta.title: Waxtaanal ak nun
cta.text: Anu dimbali la ci sa projet immobilier.

hero.label: Kolleksion Bë Nafan
hero.description: Foñ kañen kaje bënar, kaje foñi fuñë, fuñë nabu ak potansyel.

propertyDetail.whatsappMessage: Kasal, nji anaa jom ganna "{{title}}" ni {{price}} milyoŋ FCFA. I mën naa laaj alaye?
